tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Cleaning,Dental Cavity Filling,Dental Checkup (General),oral Health Checkup,
review:
I had an excellent experience at Zendent (Dr. Zeeshan Ladhani), I don’t think there’s anything they could have done better. 

The receptionist was hospitable, welcoming, courteous and alert.

The space is maintained to the highest standard - seems as though it’s brand new. Great ambiance, fresh, pleasant aroma, extremely clean and tidy space. 

Zeeshan is extremely friendly, warm, a good listener, is patient, methodical, ************* *** polite. He takes a keen interest in his patients, he is engaged in conversation, spends time patiently listening and answering any and all questions or concerns and making sure you are thoroughly satisfied. He has an honest and sincere approach and is not one to rush anything or do a half-hearted job. Can definitely whole heartedly be trusted! 
Additionally, Zeeshan is highly responsive, him and his team are in sync and they are punctual with appointments with no wait time.

Loved the doc’s choice of music and visuals on the television too!

Overall the service was top notch, highly recommend for any dental concerns and I believe in supporting establishments that are evidently putting their best foot forward and getting it right!
reply_text: Thank you for such thorough, honest and sincere review Rayhaan. It was wonderful seeing you and we look forward to seeing you for your follow ups. Best wishes always from all of us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a little swollen gum and bleeding issue.  It was my first time visiting a dentist. 
Dr. Zeeshan is very friendly and calmly explained why I was having the issue. He was very patient with my queries. The clinic was very clean and hygienic.
reply_text: Thank you Vishal for such a wonderful and sincere review. Looking forward to seeing for your follow ups.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had an emergency tooth situation whilst travelling and was seen to very promptly. Whilst the full treatment couldn’t be completed due to prior inflammation the correct course of action was taken to prioritise my care as I had onward travelling. Rather than get the job done and potentially have further swellijg and get the most money I was given the best course of treatment. Dr Zeeshan is a great dentist better than most of the UK ones
reply_text: It was a pleasure seeing you Bhavik. I am glad i was able to address the problem and provide you the best possible treatment considering your short stay and your journey back to the UK. Thank you for your faith and trust in us and for your kind words. Take care.

reply_text: Thank you for your kind words and for your faith in us sir. We look forward to seeing you for your follow ups.  Best wishes always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
As someone who is really needle (and dentist) phobic, I was really apprehensive to undergo even a basic procedure.Dr Zeeshan was was extremely mindful of this and took the time to explain what was to be expected through the course of treatment. He also picked on facial cues to assess pain/ discomfort.  I was flying out of the country within 72 hours of treatment and follow ups and check in were seamless. 
The whole experience was fantastic and as pain free as it could possibly be! Could not recommend enough!
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words. It was wonderful seeing you, enjoy your travels and we hope to see you soon for your follow ups.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Ladhani has a great presence  about him that instantly puts you at ease. He can sense discomfort without much indication. He anticipates your need before you can verbalise it.  Always seems to be looking out for how he can make your experience more comfortable. I think most people dont look forward to going to dentists clearly those people haven't been to Dr. Ladhani. He ensured my procedure was quick, painless and easy for which I was very grateful. He explained every step and outlined every option. I just felt safe, comfortable and at ease. The clinic was clean, inviting and well done up, seemed like it had the latest tech. Very happy with the experience and would highly recommend.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, we look forward to seeing you in the future for your follow ups

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
*** ** *** **** ****** ********** 100% satisfied with the  work. The  implant that was done by different dentist was not proper but Dr. from Zendent explained everything and did their best to place crown properly. 

Went back after 5 years and was fully satisfied with services. Thank you Zendent for being the best.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, we look forward to seeing you again for your follow ups. Happy travels

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Toothache,Dental Cleaning, Teeth cleaning & polishing,Tooth Filling,
review:
Dr Zeeshan has been treating my dental issues since over a year and has always been accurate in detection and treatment. My wisdom tooth ache cause was detected by him and was well treated there after. 
I've also been going to him for my regular dental hygiene (routine check ups and clean ups). His methods have helped me in improving my dental care/hygiene. 
Zendent also does regular checks on their patients after every visit to understand how the patient is doing after their treatment making the patient feel comfortable and less anxious about dental treatments.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words. Look forward to seeing you for your follow ups.

review: Went for a root canal, it was done in single sitting cap was given in next sitting. Very happy with the quality of the work done, procedure was pain free and doctor was very warm, friendly and empathetic. Wait time was zero and sterilisation was of very high standard. They have a great team and overall the experience was wonderful. They also placed implants for my parents and we are very happy with the work. *** ******* ** ****** ******* *** **** ******* ** ******* will surely keep coming for follow ups and would definitely recommend Zendent.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We look forward to seeing you again.
